Name: minimize_product_backlog_size
Description: Reduce total items waiting in the backlog

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Prefer tasks with lower estimated effort

Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Favor teams with higher historical velocity

Name: minimize_velocity_variance
Description: Reduce spread between max and min velocity

Name: minimize_feature_effort
Description: Prefer features with lower estimated effort

Name: minimize_cycle_count
Description: Reduce number of sprints via planning order
